alert.note: Alert for Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:55AM EDT until April 01 at 2:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM EDT FOR MASON...ROBERTSON...NORTHWESTERN LEWIS...SOUTHEASTERN BROWN... WESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHEASTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES... At 154 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cynthiana to near Lewisburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Winchester, Marshall, Seaman, Lewisburg, Belfast, Highland Holiday, Tollesboro, Rocky Fork Point, New Market, Emerald, Decatur, Russellville and Mowrystown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for northern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
